bug.author: ohld
bug.summary: [Bug] Wron Output folder in Colab notebook
bug.description:
When I run the Colab code it saves all produced sounds into a strange folder, so I had to manually rename the folder: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5613295/69439617-628e5680-0d58-11ea-8e34-eff01569ad42.png></denchmark-link>
This is definitely wrong :) The link to colab: <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/github/deezer/spleeter/blob/master/spleeter.ipynb>https://colab.research.google.com/github/deezer/spleeter/blob/master/spleeter.ipynb</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Duplicate bug. Fixed by next coming patch release.
Please reinstall Spleeter with 1.4.5 version and retry :)
